title: Pregaming
itunes:title: Pregaming
description:
in this episode, Bobby asks Sophie about the art of “Pregaming”, which is more likely to be practiced by her generation than his. They cover the perfect cocktails and snacks for pregaming, which occasions call for pregaming, and of course, Bobby shows Sophie how to make a grilled cheese for a sharable pregaming snack. 

For more information on “Always Hungry” follow the hosts on Instagram: 

Bobby Flay’s Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay’s Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
